name: LocalNewsForCharlotte
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Alexa is now your new source for daily LOCAL news updates. Simply add this skill to your Flash Briefing and get the local news headlines for Charlotte. Plus, find news for other cities under Skills / Categories / News
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
